basic.Peptide Name: Peptide BmKb1 (Non-disulfide-bridged peptide 4.2, NDBP-4.2; Arthropods, animals)
basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=16 µg/ml), Micrococcus luteus(MIC=81.5 µg/ml), Bacillus subtilis (MIC=48.8 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (MIC=18.1 µg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC=90.8 µg/ml).
